<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// pop&#95;back - It allows LiveRangeEdit users to drop new registers.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// The context is when an original def instruction of a register is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// dead after rematerialization, we still want to keep it for following</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// rematerializations. We save the def instruction in DeadRemats,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// and replace the original dst register with a new dummy register so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the live range of original dst register can be shrinked normally.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// We don&#39;t want to allocate phys register for the dummy register, so</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// we want to drop it from the NewRegs set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverangeedit/#ae900d06706a552fb8fa8c34a47d294f7"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/liverangeedit/#ae900d06706a552fb8fa8c34a47d294f7">pop&#95;back</a>() &#123; NewRegs.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#ad97688dfe9cd802e2a0691cbe620218a">pop&#95;back</a>(); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
